Description: The name of the output file. _Include the extension_, such as ".fasta" or ".txt".
The column that has the files you want to concatenate.
Number of CPUs to allocate to the task
Amount of storage (in GB) to allocate to the task
The Docker container to use for the task
Amount of memory/RAM (in GB) to allocate to the task

If the files you are concatenating have identical headers, you can include only the first instance of the header and skip all of the others so they do not appear duplicated in the concatenated file. To activate this, set to true.
The Docker container to use for the task
Set the time zone to get an accurate date of analysis (uses UTC by default)
